This is my uses page. The purpose of this page is basically to show my tools and hardware.

Devices

  • Lenovo IdeaPad S145
  • CPU: Ryzen 5 3500U
  • OS: Arch Linux
  • Window Manager: i3wm

riga

  • CPU: 15-7400
  • VGA: nVidia RTX 3050
  • OS: Windows 10

azura

  • Moto Z3 Play
  • OS: Android 11, LineageOS 18.1 & microG

Software

  • Text editor: neoVim
    • Font: JetBrains Mono
    • Theme: onedark.nvim
  • Shell: zsh
  • Browser: Librewolf
  • Terminal emulator: kitty
  • Photo editor: gimp
  • Video player: mpv
  • Music player: cmus
